title: [娱乐]MinecartMania Reborn——让矿车飞！[CB1.4.7]
author: henry2001
txt_content:
HI大家，这是今天的第二个好插件——让矿车飞！下面来看看有道翻译：
跳和坡道minecarts通过空气 
Travel at ludicrous speeds (no derailing!)旅行在飞快的速度(ze tai ni   不会出轨！)可以飞！设置目的地和路线自动每车通过路口。 。 
使用方块或信号来改变速度,物理,和其他属性的飞。 利用先进红石传感器触发红石电路基于类型、内容和minecart方向额。。。无限神速的矿车呀！指令：[minecart]Standard Player CommandsAny player may use these commands. (Unless explicitly denied via permissions).
CommandReq. Arg.Opt. Arg.Permission NodeDescriptions/mm infominecartmania.commands.infoShows a list of detailed minecart information for the server显示信息 /mm speed or /mm momentumminecartmania.commands.momentumshows the speed of the minecart the player is in.显示速度/trucompass or /mm trucompassminecartmania.commands.trucompassShows the direction the player is facing./st or /mm stany word-sminecartmania.commands.stSets the station value for the player. It must be followed by any string, with numbers and letters. The -s flag saves the value so that it is not reset after 1 station.时间。/throttle or /mm throttlepercentminecartmania.commands.throttleSets the speed of the minecart to either the indicated percent or the max speed of the cart, whichever is lower.OP CommandsOnly players with OP privileges (or given specific permission, if using a permission plugin) can use these commands.
CommandReq. Arg.Opt. Arg.Permission NodeDescriptions/mm helpNoneShows all available commands./mm reloadminecartmania.commands.reloadreloads the MCM config.yml/mm ejectplayer nameminecartmania.commands.ejectEjects the given player from a minecart, if they are in one./mm permejectplayer nameminecartmania.commands.permejectEjects the given player from a minecart, and prevents them from re-entering any minecart. This resets if the command is used again for the given player, or if the server is restarted./mm clearemptycarts-d, rangeminecartmania.commands.clearemptycartsRemoves all empty minecarts from the server. If -d (destroy) is set, they will not be returned to their owners. If the range is set, only carts inside the range will be cleared./mm clearpoweredcarts-d, rangeminecartmania.commands.clearpoweredcartsRemoves all powered minecarts from the server. If -d (destroy) is set, they will not be returned to their owners. If the range is set, only carts inside the range will be cleared./mm clearstoragecarts-d, rangeminecartmania.commands.clearstoragecartsRemoves all storage minecarts from the server. If -d (destroy) is set, they will not be returned to their owners. If the range is set, only carts inside the range will be cleared./mm clearoccupiedcarts-d, rangeminecartmania.commands.clearoccupiedcartsRemoves all occupied minecarts from the server, dropping players where they stand. If -d (destroy) is set, they will not be returned to their owners. If the range is set, only carts inside the range will be cleared./mm clearallcarts-d, rangeminecartmania.commands.clearallcartsRemoves all minecarts from the server. If -d (destroy) is set, they will not be returned to their owners. If the range is set, only carts inside the range will be cleared./mm clearstalledcarts-d, rangeminecartmania.commands.clearstalledcartsRemoves any unmoving minecarts from the server. If -d (destroy) is set, they will not be returned to their owners. If the range is set, only carts inside the range will be cleared./mm clearmovingcarts-d, rangeminecartmania.commands.clearmovingcartsRemoves any moving minecarts from the server. If -d (destroy) is set, they will not be returned to their owners. If the range is set, only carts inside the range will be cleared./mm redrawminecartmania.commands.redrawSends updates to all connected players to force all clients to redraw minecarts. Causes 1 second of lag./mm hideminecartmania.commands.hideHides all minecarts from view. They will continue moving, but will drop any passengers, and can not be seen unless someone re-logins or /mm redraw is used牌子指令QAQ

Sign PermissionsYou can give permissions for all signs with minecartmania.signs.create.*
Sign TypePermissionLaunch Playerminecartmania.signs.create.launchplayersignLauncherminecartmania.signs.create.launchersignSet Stationminecartmania.signs.create.setstationsignStop At Destinationminecartmania.signs.create.stopatdestinationsignLock Cartminecartmania.signs.create.lockcartUnlock Cartminecartmania.signs.create.unlockcartAutoSeed Signminecartmania.signs.create.autoseedsignAutoTill Signminecartmania.signs.create.autotillsignAutoHarvest Signminecartmania.signs.create.autoharvestsignAutoTimber Signminecartmania.signs.create.autotimbersignAutoForest Signminecartmania.signs.create.autoforestsignAutoSugar Signminecartmania.signs.create.autosugarsignAutoPlant Signminecartmania.signs.create.autoplantsignAutoCactus Signminecartmania.signs.create.autocactussignAutoReCactus Signminecartmania.signs.create.autorecactussignSeed Off Signminecartmania.signs.create.seedoffsignTill Off Signminecartmania.signs.create.tilloffsignHarvest Off Signminecartmania.signs.create.harvestoffsignTimber Off Signminecartmania.signs.create.plantoffsignCactus Off Signminecartmania.signs.create.cactusoffsignReCactus Off Signminecartmania.signs.create.recactusoffsignAlter Rangeminecartmania.signs.create.alterrangesignMax Speedminecartmania.signs.create.maxspeedsignEject Signminecartmania.signs.create.ejectsignAnnouncementminecartmania.signs.create.announcementsignHoldingminecartmania.signs.create.holdingsignElevatorminecartmania.signs.create.elevatorsignEject At Locationminecartmania.signs.create.ejectatsignFarmminecartmania.signs.create.farmsignMinimum Itemminecartmania.signs.create.minimumitemsignMaximum Itemminecartmania.signs.create.maximumitemsignJumpminecartmania.signs.create.jumpsignStationminecartmania.signs.create.stationsignKillminecartmania.signs.create.killsignPlatformminecartmania.signs.create.platformsignSpawnminecartmania.signs.create.spawnsignSet Speed 0.0minecartmania.signs.create.setspeedsignMagnetminecartmania.signs.create.magnetsignPromptminecartmania.signs.create.promptsignCatchminecartmania.signs.create.catchsignCompress Itemsminecartmania.signs.create.compressitemssignCollect Itemsminecartmania.signs.create.collectitemssignDeposit Itemsminecartmania.signs.create.deposititemssignTrash Itemsminecartmania.signs.create.trashitemssignSmelt Itemsminecartmania.signs.create.smeltitemssign下载地址在上面哦！您的回复是我的动力~~~~

replies.author: wa1019196051
replies.txt_content: 话说，全英文？英文渣看不懂啊

replies.author: 南宫黑龙
replies.txt_content: 好坑爹 这插件我要了{:10_492:}

replies.author: kvxk__120
replies.txt_content:
这么多指令，看起来是蛮不错的插件了

可惜没汉化翻译啊喂= =

replies.author: shijun
replies.txt_content: 请使用中文！……学好中国话走遍全天下！

replies.txt_content:
